#summary Infos about ADB

= Introduction =

This page contains information about the ADB (Android Debug Bridge).

= Details =
== Install ==
To install ADB, download the latest version of the Android SDK by following the instructions at http://developer.android.com/sdk.

== Usage ==
You can connect to your freerunner via USB (assuming it is mapped to eth1) with
{{{
sudo ifconfig eth1 192.168.0.200
adb kill-server
ADBHOST=192.168.0.202 adb devices
}}}
Please see http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/tools/adb.html for further details.
